Package io.adobe.cloudmanager

Interface CloudManagerApi

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CloudManagerApiImpl
    public interface CloudManagerApi
    API for interacting with Cloud Manager AdobeIO endpoints.

    Implementations of this interface must be context aware of the Adobe IMS Org when making API calls.

    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      • listPrograms

        List<EmbeddedProgram> listPrograms()
                            throws CloudManagerApiException
        List all programs in the organization
        Returns:
        a list of EmbeddedPrograms
        Throws:
        CloudManagerApiException - when any error occurs

      • listPipelines

        List<Pipeline> listPipelines​(String programId,
                             Predicate<Pipeline> predicate)
                      throws CloudManagerApiException
        Lists all pipelines in the program, that meed the predicate clause.
        Parameters:
        programId - the program id
        predicate - a predicate used to filter the pipelines
        Returns:
        a list of Pipelines
        Throws:
        CloudManagerApiException - when any error occurs

      • downloadLogs

        List<EnvironmentLog> downloadLogs​(String programId,
                                  String environmentId,
                                  String service,
                                  String logName,
                                  int days,
                                  File dir)
                           throws CloudManagerApiException
        Downloads the logs for the specified environment.
        Parameters:
        programId - the program id context for the environment
        environmentId - the environment id
        service - the service name for log filtering
        logName - the name of the logfile in the service to download
        days - how many days of log files to retrieve
        dir - the directory in which to save the files
        Returns:
        a list of EnvironmentLogs with details about the downloaded files
        Throws:
        CloudManagerApiException - when any error occurs.

      • downloadLogs

        List<EnvironmentLog> downloadLogs​(Environment environment,
                                  String service,
                                  String logName,
                                  int days,
                                  File dir)
                           throws CloudManagerApiException
        Downloads the logs for the specified environment.
        Parameters:
        environment - the environment context
        service - the service name for log filtering
        logName - the name of the logfile in the service to download
        days - how many days of log files to retrieve
        dir - the directory in which to save the files
        Returns:
        a list of EnvironmentLogs with details about the downloaded files
        Throws:
        CloudManagerApiException - when any error occurs.

      • getExecutionStepLog

        void getExecutionStepLog​(String programId,
                         String pipelineId,
                         String executionId,
                         String action,
                         OutputStream outputStream)
                  throws CloudManagerApiException
        Streams the specified Execution Step log to the provided output stream. This will close the output stream when done.

        Uses the default log file name for the step.

        Parameters:
        programId - the program id of the pipeline context
        pipelineId - the pipeline id for the execution context
        executionId - the execution id for the logs
        action - the execution step action for the log
        outputStream - output stream to write to
        Throws:
        CloudManagerApiException - when any error occurs.

      • getExecutionStepLog

        void getExecutionStepLog​(String programId,
                         String pipelineId,
                         String executionId,
                         String action,
                         String name,
                         OutputStream outputStream)
                  throws CloudManagerApiException
        Streams the specified Execution Step log to the provided output stream. This will close the output stream when done.
        Parameters:
        programId - the program id of the pipeline context
        pipelineId - the pipeline id for the execution context
        executionId - the execution id for the logs
        action - the execution step action for the log
        name - custom log file name
        outputStream - output stream to write to
        Throws:
        CloudManagerApiException - when any error occurs.

      • getExecutionStepLog

        void getExecutionStepLog​(PipelineExecutionStepState action,
                         OutputStream outputStream)
                  throws CloudManagerApiException
        Streams the specified Execution Step log to the provided output stream. This will close the output stream when done.
        Parameters:
        action - the execution step action for the log
        outputStream - output stream to write to
        Throws:
        CloudManagerApiException - when any error occurs.

      • getExecutionStepLog

        void getExecutionStepLog​(PipelineExecutionStepState action,
                         String name,
                         OutputStream outputStream)
                  throws CloudManagerApiException
        Streams the specified Execution Step log to the provided output stream. This will close the output stream when done.
        Parameters:
        action - the execution step action for the log
        name - the log file name or null for the default
        outputStream - output stream to write to
        Throws:
        CloudManagerApiException - when any error occurs.
